Package main

Class Elevator

java.lang.Object
main.Elevator
public class Elevator extends Object

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    (package private) Building
    building
    A reference to a building instance that a Person is in.
    private ArrayList<Job>
    jobs
    A list of Jobs (as an array), where each Job represents a person and the floor to which they desire to go.
    (package private) int
    location
    The number corresponding to the current location the elevator is at.
    static int
    maxOccupants
    This specifies the number of people that can be brought to their floors by an Elevator instance at any given time.

      public static int maxOccupants
      This specifies the number of people that can be brought to their floors by an Elevator instance at any given time.

      DO NOT REMOVE THIS FIELD

      You may edit it. But keep it public.

  • Method Details

    • getJobs

      public ArrayList<Job> getJobs()
      Getter and setter.

    • setJobs

      public void setJobs(ArrayList<Job> jobs)
      Getter and setter.

    • createJob

      public boolean createJob(Person person, int floor)
      This method should simply add, in the right place, a new job to be completed by the elevator.
      Parameters:
      person - the person that requested the elevator
      floor - the desired floor number
      Returns:
      will be true

    • processAllJobs

      public void processAllJobs()
      This method should remove jobs one by one (in the right order) and process them individually.

    • processJob

      public boolean processJob(Job job)
      This method should process a job, and move the elevator floor by floor (while printing updates) in order to reach the desired floor. Then, the exit method should be called, simulating the exit of a person (if necessary).
      Parameters:
      job - the job to be processed
      Returns:
      boolean

    • exit

      public boolean exit(Person person, int floor)
      This method should call a method on the Building for a person to enter a given floor (hold a reference to the person in the given floor).
      Parameters:
      person - the person exiting at a given floor
      floor - the floor at which the person is exiting
      Returns:
      a bool from person.building.enterFloor()

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
